entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: The White House is now mounting a defense to the widely-held criticism that Trump was slow to respond to the pandemic. McEnany claims Trump has led "one of the best responses we've seen in our country's history." Worth noting Trump publicly played down the threat for weeks.
